channel.description: Curated feed of new AI/LLM models from HuggingFace, arXiv, Open LLM Leaderboard, ModelScope, and official catalogs. Updated daily by LyDian AI Discovery.

item.title: LyDian Analiz Motoru
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Analiz Motoru with improved coding, reasoning, and visual capabilities. 200K context window. Tags: multimodal, coding, reasoning, large-context.

item.title: LyDian Velocity Motor
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Velocity Motor with 128K context window and improved performance. Optimized for complex multi-step tasks. Tags: multimodal, large-context, instruction-following.

item.title: LyDian Vision Motor
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Vision Motor with 1M token context window. Native multimodal understanding across text, images, video, and audio. Tags: multimodal, ultra-long-context, video-understanding.

item.title: LyDian Kod Motoru
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Kod Motoru - large-scale language model. Instruction-tuned for general tasks with 128K context. Tags: large-scale, instruction-following.

item.title: LyDian Hizli Motor
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Hizli Motor - Mixture of Experts model with strong performance. Tags: mixture-of-experts, multilingual.

item.title: LyDian Arastirma Motoru
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Arastirma Motoru - MoE model with high performance. Tags: mixture-of-experts, cost-efficient.

item.title: LyDian Cokdil Motoru
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI
item.description: LyDian Cokdil Motoru - Strong multilingual and code generation capabilities. Tags: multilingual, coding.

item.title: Stable Diffusion 3.5 Large - Stability AI
item.dc:creator: Stability AI
item.description: Latest Stable Diffusion model with 8B parameters. Improved text rendering and prompt following. Downloads: 230K, Likes: 2.1K. Tags: text-to-image, diffusion, open-weights. License: stabilityai-community.

item.title: FLUX.1-dev - Black Forest Labs
item.dc:creator: Black Forest Labs
item.description: State-of-the-art open-weights text-to-image model. Exceptional prompt following and image quality. Downloads: 185K, Likes: 1.85K. Tags: text-to-image, open-weights, high-quality. License: apache-2.0.

item.title: Command R+ - Cohere
item.dc:creator: Cohere
item.description: Cohere's flagship model optimized for enterprise RAG and tool use. Strong multilingual capabilities. Benchmarks: MMLU 79.5, HumanEval 72.0. Tags: enterprise, rag-optimized, multilingual, tool-use. License: proprietary.
